Reviews.Title: On  my 2nd laptop with an issue
Reviews.Author: Kerri Santos
Reviews.Content: I just received my 2nd laptop ... Amazon was wonderful with replacing my initial one that had a screen issue when I received it.  The screen started flickering immediately upon starting it up.  I've heard this is a frequent issue with HP.  My replacement laptop arrived and this one has an issue as well!  The keyboard is terrible and I have no idea why.  I'm not a super fast typer, but am also not super slow ... and so many of the letters I type just don't show up on the screen.  Sometimes I have to hit the key 3 times before it shows up.  I've even tried using a separate keyboard and had the same issue.  I'm not super techy and have no clue why this would be happening, but it is infuriating and I'm returning AGAIN.  I'm going to have to go with something different because two product issues is just CRAZY.

Reviews.Title: GREAT LAPTOP
Reviews.Author: George F. Woodruff
Reviews.Content: This is my first laptop and it works...that is if I can ever figure out Windows 8. At 87 it isn't easy but I get a lot of help from the nursing staff here at Trinka Davis Veterans Village CLC, in Carrollton, GA. I will reccomend it to some of the older disabled veterans here. Just kidding.

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop, Awesome Screen Resolution
Reviews.Author: Roger Davis
Reviews.Content: Replaced my old XP laptop with this one and have the A8 quad chip in it which seems to perform pretty close to an I5 Intel chip. Price is great for a 17" touchscreen. A little heavy but that's a small tradeoff for the huge screen and fast processor. Really like this product and it is really fast compared to my old clunker!I also bought a second power supply so I don't have to carry that from my home to my office every day. Although not full HD (but very close) the screen has amazing resolution, especially when viewing an HD video and it is almost impossible to discern any difference between it and 1080P. The sound is OK but certainly not exceptional, although it sounds much better through external speakers.Great laptop for the price. Don't buy a comparable brand that has a much lower screen resolution.

Reviews.Title: It is a good computer
Reviews.Author: Jordan
Reviews.Content: We enjoy this computer because it is kind of our entertainment center. We do not have a TV. We enjoy the touch screen and build quality.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Khadijah M
Reviews.Content: I love this laptop, I didn't want to spend a pretty penny on something that I wouldn't enjoy or get my money's worth but I did take a chance on this since I could not find any type of review for this particular laptop so I guess it was the newest of the new on this line but it is a great laptop, it doesn't lag very often, it's smooth, the huge screen was giant step up from my 11in laptop I had for 3 years and the touch screen is a very nice addition to it's already nice specs it has.

Reviews.Title: Its okay
Reviews.Author: Jewel Justice
Reviews.Content: I like the laptop, but it should of came with paperwork on how to set it up and a userguide that way people know how to get started on it.

Reviews.Title: Too heavy to carry around
Reviews.Author: M. Alade
Reviews.Content: The laptop is heavy compare to what i use to beside that it is ok, the window 8.1 force me to use my email to logon instead of login on locally on my home network, and also find it difficult to connect to my home network printer telling me the credential is not sufficient.

Reviews.Title: great laptop
Reviews.Author: Gabriela Buis
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a new laptop for the right price. I found this. I love the big screen and dual viewing capability with touch screen. It fulfills my need perfectly. Sometimes it lags not sure if its my optimum wifi Or the laptop*.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Shaun benoit
Reviews.Content: Love the big screen and love the touchscreen. I am completely satisfied with this laptop. I would buy it allover

Reviews.Title: Changed my mind!
Reviews.Author: Happy D.D. "Downing D"
Reviews.Content: When I initially ordered this laptop, I was a little skeptical because I had heard windows 8 is very complicated to navigate.  I was going to return this laptop for a refund, my son convinced me to work with it and try to learn windows 8.  Well I am doing better, but what I love about this laptop is the size I don't have to strain my eyes to see what I'm doing.  I love the touch screen.  I don't recommend windows 8 without a touch screen.  The graphics are clear and you can change the font size to make it larger.  I am not a tech person, but I think windows 8 is not a good idea.  I don't know what you call it but the button you click to move the pointer is very loud, almost annoying. That is why I only gave 4 stars.  I did not purchase the warranty plan.  I hope I won't have any problems with this laptop.  Overall I am happy with my purchase.  My other choice for a 17 inch was the apple.  They don't make them anymore, so I would have to buy a refurbished one.  I was not willing to spend 1,300 for a used laptop.  If you purchase the HP I think you will be happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop!
Reviews.Author: Harriet F. Cutler
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this laptop!  Windows  8.1 isn't that bad as some make it out to be.  I went from a desktop windows xp to this and I am getting around great on the most part.  each  day I learn new tricks on how to do things I didn't know.  So many built in features and love the touchscreen--best of both worlds having the built in mouse and touchscreen!  Great deal for the money!!!! I have to admit that sometimes when I am typing the font sizes changes and makes it bigger so I have to readjust but that is minor. It's a learning experience using touchscreen to copy and paste but as I mentioned I am learning the new way.  Love having apps!

Reviews.Title: good item
Reviews.Author: Dionnys Rosario
Reviews.Content: It's a good item, it didn't present problem yet hdmi compatible with my smart tv. You must buy one lok

Reviews.Title: Great laptop at a Great Price.
Reviews.Author: Newkster
Reviews.Content: This laptop was worked as publicized.It has all the bell and whistles an a touch screen too.And the price was right.

Reviews.Title: May not be what you're looking for.
Reviews.Author: John R. Burke
Reviews.Content: I bought the Pavilion to replace my old computer because of the Vista issue with Microsoft. I spent hours with both the HP people in India and the Microsoft people in India trying to get my email account transferred from my cable provider to the new HP.  The  Microsoft 8.1 system wasn't compatible even thought there were instructions explaining how to accomplish the transfer. I'm in the process of returning the Pavilion and a HP printer I purchased from another vender.
